name: Multiplayer Ψ2d
description:
Psi2d is a web-based multi-player and mobile-friendly 2D shooter platformer.

The game is currently hosted at //psi2d.herokuapp.com.

Instructions:

  • on mobiles: swipe on the lower side of canvas to move; tap on the upper side of the canvas to shoot.
  • on desktops: WAD/arrows/space to move; click to fire

Have fun.
